iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Serbia
iati-activity.description: Objective of the project "Vocational Training of young Roma people from the settlements GrmeÃ¨ and Zemun polje" is to enrol 15 unemployed Roma people from settlements GrmeÃ¨ and Zemun polje in receiving the official certificate after successfully completed vocational training on basic IT course and entrepreneurship as well as an active job search workshops during a 3-5 months course. The training practice will be organized on the Academia Educativa (3-5 months). This project will have influence on the social environment of Roma families. Project will also contribute to the improvement of the awareness of participation in educational system which is very important for future generation of Roma. Social worker will do interviews and select the right persons who are willing to enroll in project. Main criterium will be social status, poverty, willingnes to enroll in vocational training as well
